\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\usepackage{amsmath,amsthm}
\usepackage[ngerman,english]{babel}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{automata,positioning}

\begin{document}

\begin{tikzpicture}[shorten >=1pt,node distance=2cm,on grid,auto]

	\node[state,initial]	 (z0)		{z0};
	\node[state]	 (z1)	[right of=z0]		{z1};
	\node[state,accepting]	 (z2)	[right of=z1]		{z2};
\path[->]
(z0) 	 edge [bend left=0]node {a}	(z1)
 edge [bend left=90]node {a}	(z2)
(z1) 	 edge [bend left=0]node {b}	(z2)
 edge [loop below] node {a}	(z1)
(z2) 	 edge [loop below] node {b}	(z2)
 edge [bend left=90]node {a}	(z0)
;
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
